ch0011_00_homika/0101_0701_02_10:
If you have some time, have a battle with me!
I’m just bursting with energy!
ch0011_00_homika/0601_0701_01_10: I love Pokémon and music equally.
ch0011_00_homika/0601_0701_02_10:
I could never choose one over the other, so
that’s why I do double duty!
ch0011_00_homika/0601_0701_03_10:
I can tell you’re wondering if I’m actually
able to be any good at either.
ch0011_00_homika/0601_0701_04_10:
Of course I am!
Why wouldn’t I be?
ch0011_00_homika/0601_0702_01_10:
If there are things you’re itching to try, you
should just go for them!
ch0011_00_homika/0601_0702_02_10:
Sitting around being indecisive doesn’t get
you anywhere!
ch0011_00_homika/0602_0701_01_10:
You know, my old man has two jobs, too,
just like me.
ch0011_00_homika/0602_0701_02_10: He’s a ship’s captain and an actor!
ch0011_00_homika/0602_0701_03_10:
Although I gotta say, he gets a bit caught up
in acting sometimes and lets his ship just sit
in harbor.
ch0011_00_homika/0602_0701_04_10:
It’s not good to cause problems for
people, right?
ch0011_00_homika/0602_0702_01_10:
See, I want to support my old man’s dream of
becoming an actor.
ch0011_00_homika/0602_0702_02_10:
I mean, I went and saw the movie he was in,
and it was pretty good.
ch0011_00_homika/0603_0701_01_10:
Sometimes, when I’m out exploring,
inspiration just hits me out of nowhere!
ch0011_00_homika/0603_0701_02_10: It’s a great help to my song writing.
ch0011_00_homika/0603_0702_01_10:
Sometimes, working two jobs can show you
new things.
ch0011_00_homika/0603_0702_02_10: But you can’t slack off on either of them!
ch0011_00_homika/0604_0701_01_10:
Whirlipede normally sits pretty still and
doesn’t move much...
ch0011_00_homika/0604_0701_02_10: but if she’s attacked, she jumps into action!
ch0011_00_homika/0604_0701_03_10:
It’s like she’s letting all that stored-up
energy explode!
ch0011_00_homika/0604_0701_04_10:
She’s definitely a Pokémon that knows how to
put on an invigorating show, right?
ch0011_00_homika/0604_0702_01_10: Unleash your energy when it really counts!
ch0011_00_homika/0604_0702_02_10:
It’s what Whirlipede taught me, you know?
You can’t just be all out all the time. You need
to make your efforts really count!
ch0011_00_homika/0605_0701_02_10:
Huh? Oh, sessions are when we go
exploring together!
ch0011_00_homika/0605_0701_03_10:
Sometimes, I get this comfortable feeling, like
I’m hanging out with my band members!
ch0011_00_homika/0605_0702_01_10: I can feel my spirits rising when I’m with you!
ch0011_00_homika/0605_0702_02_10: It’s like I have even more energy than usual!
ch0011_00_homika/1701_0701_02_10:
Oh, no no, I don’t want anything back!
I just felt like giving something to you!
ch0011_00_homika/1701_0702_01_10: Make sure to use that item I gave you, OK?
ch0011_00_homika/1701_0702_02_10: A really good Trainer puts items to good use!
ch0011_00_homika/2501_0701_01_10: Hey, about you and your Pokémon!
ch0011_00_homika/2501_0701_02_10: You’re getting really strong, aren’t you!
ch0011_00_homika/2501_0701_03_10:
Not just pure strength. Your will to win is
getting stronger, too!
ch0011_00_homika/2501_0701_04_10: Watching you gets me pumped, too!
ch0011_00_homika/2501_0702_01_10:
I’ll never use my double duty with my band
as an excuse for anything!
ch0011_00_homika/2501_0702_02_10:
I don’t plan on letting you win our Pokémon
battles, either, so there!
ch0011_00_homika/2511_0701_01_10: The song I’m working on—it’s going to be great!
ch0011_00_homika/2511_0701_02_10: See, I’m making my adventures here into a song!
ch0011_00_homika/2511_0701_03_10: Oh, of course you’re gonna be in the song, too!
ch0011_00_homika/2511_0701_04_10:
There’s no way any of my adventures here
on Pasio would happen without you!
ch0011_00_homika/2511_0702_01_10: I still want more ideas for new songs, though.
ch0011_00_homika/2511_0702_02_10:
So that means you’re gonna keep exploring
with me, all right?!
ch0011_00_homika/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! You’re looking energetic!
Keep it up, and let’s get some stuff done!
ch0011_00_homika/3002_0701_01_10:
Giving your all from the beginning of the day,
huh? Just make sure you don’t burn yourself out!
ch0011_00_homika/3003_0701_01_10:
It’s a waste if you don’t give it your all
when the sun’s out!
ch0011_00_homika/3004_0701_01_10:
Managing a band and Pokémon
means using time effectively!
ch0011_00_homika/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s all about timing—we gotta play our
hearts out, till the last chord of the night!
ch0011_00_homika/3006_0701_01_10:
I was thinking about calling it a night.
But if you’re still good to go, then so am I!
